title: Statistical Society of Canada SARGC Video Competition 2021.

yaml.title: Statistical Society of Canada SARGC Video Competition 2021.
yaml.author: **Dylan Spicker** and Melissa Van Bussel
yaml.description: **Winning Team**; Video competition, explaining the importance of statistics to a lay audience. Our video is available: '[Using Statistics to break down COVID-19 misconceptions](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=U7mMYxGzSUk).'
